price: Maka Kami tutup telinga mereka di dalam gua itu,486) selama beberapa tahun,
arabic: فَضَرَبۡنَا عَلَىٰٓ ءَاذَانِهِمۡ فِي ٱلۡكَهۡفِ سِنِينَ عَدَدٗا
footnotes: *486) Allah menidurkan mereka selama 309 tahun qamariah dalam gua itu (lihat ayat 25 surat ini) sehingga mereka tak dapat dibangunkan oleh suara apa pun.

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Ministry of Islamic Affairs
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: faḍarabnā ʿalā ādhānihim fī al-kahfi sinīna ʿadadan
